department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Acquisition, delivery, and installation of various lockers
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Acquisition of Lockers for PSPC's Quebec Region

#### Solicitation Number
 WS4339510787

#### Solicitation Title
 EE474-241540 Acquisition of SA furniture of category 3 for PSPC - RFP

#### Publication Date
 2023-12-05

#### Tender Closing Date
 2023-12-20T14:00:00

#### Term of Reference
 PWGSC (Public Works and Government Services Canada) invites proposals to acquire, deliver, and install lockers (category 3) for its Quebec region. The scope of the project involves providing various types of lockers to fulfill the requirements of the end-user entity.

#### Solicitation Method
 Competitive - Selective Tendering

#### Procurement Method
 The solicitation will be conducted through a competitive, selective tendering process.

#### Evaluation Criteria
 The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Trade Agreements
 This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Contact Information
 For any inquiries or questions, please contact:

Julie Carbonneau (SPAC/PSPC) (elle-la/she-her)
Phone: None
Email: julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
[More details can be found on this notice on the Ariba Discovery website][1]

[1]: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18196224?extsite=MTgxOTYyMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Language
 English and French

#### Attachments
 No attachments are provided with this solicitation. All relevant information and documentation is included in the solicitation notice.  return #end{
